rdf:Description.dc:title: Let's talk : a guide to resolving workplace conflicts 2007 a guide to resolving workplace conflicts.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Employment, Immigration and Industry.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Government of Alberta, Department of Employment, Immigration and Industry,
rdf:Description.dc:description: If you've ever experienced disagreements in the workplace, this book is for you. The conflict resolution methods presented are helpful for employees and employers of large, medium and small organizations, whether it's a private sector company or a not-for-profit association. Contains information on how to handle situations internally and where to get outside help. -- ALIS web site.
Alberta Government Library: Approved for use in Alberta schools.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Conflict management
Personnel management
Interpersonal conflict
Industrial relations
